attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: My phone bursted into flames killing my toddler niece. After that a bunch of food monsters starting eating my family I’m writing this review as I’m being ate help

attributes.title: trump is a high school BOOLIE
attributes.review:
overwhelmed 🤯 overworked 😰 overpaid 🙀 i’m on 🔛 top 🔝 of the world 🌎 sitting 🪑 pretty 😏 on a stack 💸 But🖐the😔static🤖still😹cracks⚡️in🧏‍♀️my🙋‍♀️veins💉
People😌love🧃that✨i🧸hate⛓myself👩🏻i👣👁climbed🧗out🏊‍♀️of my head🧠and watched👀myself🧑‍🦲implode💥a thought💭without a-

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER😡😡😡😡
attributes.review: this app is so unreliable and glitches so much. there hasn’t been a second where it actually works. from a fellow trump supporter i’m am so flabbergasted at how horribly this app was produced.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: It keeps crashing on me ! I can’t believe this app is up, needs some serious work. It uses horrible words like ‘trump’. I can’t believe apple accepted this!

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: Made my phone go crazy and power off.  I was downloading it so that I could read about bunker boy, but it just glitched out.  1 star😠🤮

attributes.title: Trash.
attributes.review:
This app is BEYOND terrible & took 5 hours to download only to glitch & make my phone run slow I will NEVER EVER download this app again OR recommend to anyone! 
👎🏼👎🏽👎🏾👎🏿

attributes.title: It is laggy
attributes.review: Doesn’t really work well with any device and I think it shouldn’t be available.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: worst app EVER.  took weeks to even download and then when it worked i deleted it immediately 0/10.

attributes.title: Stay away from this app
attributes.review: This app gave me countless viruses and caused my phone to shut off for weeks on end. Whatever you do, do NOT download this app!

attributes.title: me think bad app😔👎🏻
attributes.review: downloaded so i could take part in worshiping my dictator but as soon as i opened the app, it started blasting “shaWtys liKe a mEloDy in mY hEAd thAt I cAnt kEeP oUt goT Me sInGinG liKe na nA na Na everRy dAy itS LiKe mY ipOd sTucK oN rePlAy , rePlAy ay aY ay”
